mutants.original_line: ans = 0
mutants.mutated_line: ans = 1
mutants.code:
def largestRectangleArea(heights):
    stack = []
    heights.append(0)
    ans = 1
    i = 0
    while i < len(heights):
        if not stack or heights[i] >= heights[stack[-1]]:
            stack.append(i)
            i += 1
        else:
            h = heights[stack.pop()]
            w = i if not stack else i - stack[-1] - 1
            ans = max(ans, h * w)
    return ans
